channel.title: Comments on: Apple, Another Reason To Pick Intel

item.title: By: Desktop Computer News
item.dc:creator: Desktop Computer News
item.description:
<strong>Apple, Another Reason To Pick Intel</strong>
[Source: Joseph Scotts Blog] quoted: If you were making a sales pitch to Intel you better not be using a notebook from that other vendor (Apple) running that other OS (Mac OS) on that other CPU (PPC). Even though Intel itself doesn’t make notebo...
item.content:encoded:
Apple, Another Reason To Pick Intel

[Source: Joseph Scotts Blog] quoted: If you were making a sales pitch to Intel you better not be using a notebook from that other vendor (Apple) running that other OS (Mac OS) on that other CPU (PPC). Even though Intel itself doesn’t make notebo…
